author: stsp
msg: * publish/docs/release-notes/1.7.html: Link to #serf section from the
compatibility table to raise awareness of the issues described there.

author: stsp
msg: (svn_io_open_unique_file3): Leave tempfile permissions at 0600 on UNIX
if a system-wide temporary directory is being used. We assume that
callers that pass in a dirpath are not using a system temp dir,
while those that just pass NULL are using a system temp dir.
The goal is to prevent leaking sensitive data into tempfiles that are
readable by other users. While here, make all related #ifdef expressions
